alert.note: Alert for Kingman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 02 at 4:37PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Harper and southwestern Kingman Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 436 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Isabel, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Kingman, Nashville, Willowdale, Zenda, Spivey, Cleveland and Crystal Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central Kansas.
